marklogic.body: Congress is useless, obama and democrat governors held their own meetings to bypass the congressional body. Its "WE the People" not the president and congress allowing the people freedoms. If you dont want to carry a firearm so be it. DONT. But dont tell me its wrong. This was to incite lawlessness and have the seal of approval from obama. obama desicively made and choose to take a side and endorse it. obama endorses lawlessness and approves of this action.
